!!! error TS1128: Declaration or statement expected.
    
    export type Page<P = NonNullable<unknown>> = ComponentType<P> & {
        getLayout?: (component: JSX.Element) => JSX.Element;
    }
    
    export const FooPage: Page = () => {
        return (
            <div>
                <p>Foo</p>
            </div>
        )
    };
    
    FooPage.getLayout = () => {
        return <></>
    };
